title.rendered: AI Verse Hackathon [Online; March 19-22; Prize Pool Worth Rs. 45k]: Register by March 14th!

content.rendered:
Register for AI Verse Hackathon by March 14th. It is online and presents a wide array of prizes and opportunities!

About The Hackathon

AI Verse by Augment.AI, a 72-hour online hackathon (March 19th-22nd) where undergraduate students across India build AI-powered solutions to enhance service quality. Augment.AI, an initiative by the Information Science Department at BMS College of Engineering, is a dedicated community focused on Artificial Intelligence. It aims to unite individuals passionate about AI, fostering learning, collaboration, and innovation. Through workshops, projects, and events, Augment.AI provides students with hands-on experience in AI and its real-world applications. The hackathon reflects this mission by challenging participants to develop AI-driven solutions that enhance existing services. Committed to pushing the boundaries of AI, the initiative encourages creativity and problem-solving while enabling participants to sharpen their technical skills and contribute to meaningful innovations. By engaging with Augment.AI, individuals become part of a movement that blends technology with purpose, shaping the future of AI.

Details

  • Dates: March 19th – 22nd
  • Team Size: 3-4 members
  • Prize Pool: ₹45,000
  • Format: Online (Discord communication)
  • Registration Fee: ₹200 per team (paid by the team leader)

How to Register?

  • The Team Leader completes the registration form and pays the ₹200 fee.
  • Upon verification, a confirmation email will be sent containing:
    • A link to submit team member details (team changes allowed until the deadline).
    • An invitation to the official Discord server for all event communication.

Important Dates

  • 25 February 2025 – Registration Begins
  • 14 March 2025 – Registration Ends
  • 15 March 2025 – Online Inauguration
  • 19 March 2025 – Hackathon Starts
  • 22 March 2025 – Submissions
  • 02 April 2025 – Announcement of Winners

Eligibility

Open to only undergraduate students from India

Deadline

The deadline for registration is March 14, 2025.

Click here to view the official notification of AI Verse Hackathon.
